title: What If You Could See The Entire Sugar Production Line In Action?

tasks.task: Plant sugarcane using a mechanized planter.
subtasks: Load seed canes into a hopper.
The machine cuts stalks to the desired length.
The machine places the seed canes into furrows.
The machine covers the seed canes with soil.
The machine applies fertilizer as needed.
Drive the harvester between sugar cane rows.
The machine's spinning blades cut the stalks near the base.
The automatic conveyor system collects the cut canes.
The machine separates leaves and tops from the canes.
The separated leaves and tops are returned to the field.

tasks.task: Transport sugar cane to a factory.
subtasks: Load sugar cane onto specialized trucks.
Drive the trucks to the sugar refinery.

tasks.task: Process sugar cane at a factory.
subtasks: Crush the sugar cane on conveyor belts using steel rollers.
Extract the juice through filters and settling tanks.
Heat the juice in vats to create syrup and crystallize sugar.
Use a centrifuge to separate molasses from sugar.
Dry and cool the crystallized sugar into white crystals.
Convert bagasse into organic fertilizer.
Compress and sell bagasse as biodegradable paper products.
Use bagasse to create biochar for soil improvement.
